# nodeIdentifyR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Outline node specific target points in the prevention and intervention of critical transitions in psychopathology networks.  
This packages provides function for the identification of nodes that have a high prevention-potential or intervention-potential for psychopathological network structures.

## Installation

You can install the development version of nodeIdentifyR with help from the devtools-package like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("JasperNaberman/nodeIdentifyR")
```
